articles.title: Actor Karthik Kumar sends legal notice to ex-wife Suchitra, threatens defamation case - India Today
articles.description: Actor and stand-up comedian Karthik Kumar sent a legal notice to his ex-wife singer Suchitra He also threatened to file a defamation case if she doesn039t stop giving interviews about him
